Description: This stunning 1 bedroom, 1 bathroom unit at "The Saybrook" is conveniently situated close to The Boston Landing neighborhood & Commuter Rail station, Brighton Center, The Charles River, & the plethora of redevelopment in Allston, lead by Harvard. This elegant boutique building evokes a connected urban lifestyle in the midst of the neighborhoods energized culture. Modern yet timeless design is showcased through the luxurious finishes which include Jenn-Air appliances, marble bathrooms, custom cabinetry, quartz waterfall counters, & Ann Sacks designer tile. Unit also features central HVAC & in unit laundry. The building has great amenities such as a fitness room, elevator, and bike storage.
